comment: It is not common courtesy in Australia. When you get pulled over here, the first thing the police tell you to do is to stay in your car and turn it off. comment: I wouldn't consider it in terms of a good tone. there is more confidence and dominance. Who is more important. And who is more "lazy" to go. Previously, the driver often went to the inspector himself. Don't know if it is somewhere written in the rules or established practices. In recent years, the inspector himself goes to the car, and it is waiting. But this I watch in the Moscow region. Russia is large, and perhaps in other regions there are old practices.
